page.title: 13My House
page.content: My house is a three bedroomed house with one bathroom.I have a big kitchen with a porch by the back door.We have a large room downstairs.We use this as a living room and a dining room.We have two hallways,one upstairs and one downstairs.The hallway downstairs leads to the living room and the kitchen. Under the stairs there is a cupboard where you hang your coats. The hallway upstairs leads to the bathroom and all of the bedrooms.There are two big bedrooms and one small bedroom. The house is semi-detached.It has two big gardens and one little yard with two drives one in the front garden and one in the back garden .
